title: ride offer: portland to davis/sacramento 11/20 (ne)
shortDescription:
i will be driving south tuesday morning (10:00-12:00). $25 to ashland/medford, $50 all the way to sacramento. 
i am a sane, friendly, 26 year old person. if you'd be willing to drive, that'd be great. 
please email. 
rob

title: driving portland ->spokane monday
shortDescription: im heading east monday morning before noon. it would be great to have help with gas & upkeep... asking $60. i will pick you up and drop you off where you need to go. call/text: 541-five one five-8873 thanks!
